segments.text: What kind of a car do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it's old , but what make is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a Chevrolet . Why do you ask ? You going into the car business ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing like that . My cousin is going to take a job overseas and he can't take his car with him , so he's going to sell it - cheap . It's practically new .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well I have been thinking about getting a newer car . I can't afford a brand new one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to look at my cousin's car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it a four-door or a two-door ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a coupe with a vinyl roof .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and it also has power steering , power brakes , and air conditioning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I might take a look at it .
segments.speaker: S2
